member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ReflectorR3
member.summary: A ReflectorR3 module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ReflectorR3.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ReflectorR3.Read(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ReflectorR3.Reflectors)
member.summary: Gets the reflective reading from one of the reflectors.
member.returns: A number between 0 and 1 where 0 is no reflection and 1 is maximum reflection.
